divs: Sighting DetailsWhile driving home from work on July 5, 01 at 6:10PM I spotted a very bright teardrop shaped object It was the brightness of theobject that first cought my attention, then the teardrop shape. I thought thatthis was noght an ordanory aircraft.I almost came to a stop. The object was avery bright silver color and it was their one minuet and gone vannished asquick, almost as it seemed to notice I spotted it.
